summary.para: Adds a reference within the encrypted package bundle to an external app package.

param.name: fileName
param.para: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of fileName.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a write-only object model for encrypted bundle packages.
